message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a deal at that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. $90 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $95. It's a fair price for both of us, and I think we can close the deal. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $95, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
